Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory217.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "Ohoho, you can run, but you can't hide!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Children', 3: "Hmph... W-we won't lose to you Babylonian devils! Everyone, attack!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: 'Buddy up! Swimming by, complete! Supersonic Derek Wahoo!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Atiel', 3: "Aaa-rgh! I'll beee baaack!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "Atiel... I don't think you should be teaching the ARU kids that we're devils... That can't be right, can it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "We're just messing around... It's fine!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Far away from battle, you see Simon and Atiel frolicking with children.'}
{3: 'A few armed fishermen are off to the side. Looks like they are the ones living in the residential regions that Simon mentioned.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: "Oh! Rosetta! Rosetta, you're back?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you introduce yourselves, a child in a thick downy jacket, wearing a shiny gadget around his neck, notices you and the others.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Evan, what was that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "Oh, that was Derek's whale song. I recorded it some time ago. Do you like it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Anyway, what brings you here?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "I came with everyone to live here not long ago. Then those monsters attacked... But since you're here, Rosetta, that means we can go home!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Mh-hm. I'll have you home in no time.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "Anyway, who's the egghead?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Egghead...', 3: '21', 4: "We've met before.", 5: '22'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "That's just how the kids call Polar Soldiers. Since it's all round and tubby.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'This is the commandant of Gray Raven. Remember?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: 'Oh... Yeah, I remember!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta's reminder seems to have jogged Evan's memory. He immediately tries to shield Rosetta behind him, like a mother hen protecting her chicks."}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "I won't let you go, Rosetta!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm sorry. Evan is...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "Hmph, we'll see!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: 'Alright, calm down. We have to get down to business. Come on, go on and play with the other kids.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: 'Hey! Wait up!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Before Evan could protest further, a fisherman suddenly lifted Evan and threw him right onto the children's snow pile with expert precision."}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: 'Sorry for troubling you all.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Looking the fisherman up and down, you recognize him from before. His expression was much softer now, looking squarely at Rosetta and the other Forest Guards.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Rosetta, this is what I was talking about earlier.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Yeah... Even if there are only a few people, everyone is pointed in the right direction.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: 'But regardless of how good it gets, the Forest Guards are still branded as "sinners"...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Don't salt the wound, Simon...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: "I'm just stating a fact. Keep your hands to yourself!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Atiel and Simon walk over, but Atiel is somehow limping as if something's wrong."}
{2: 'Where are you hurt?', 3: '39', 4: 'Are we going to begin the attack?', 5: '40'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "A connection on my foot is probably just on the fritz... But it doesn't matter. I can continue to fight.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Yes, the recon has been completed as well.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'In short, the remaining Forest Guards and us Babylonians will set out in ten minutes and lure the bionics into battle.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Gotcha... That should prevent the base from sustaining any collateral damage.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Simon', 3: "That's what I was thinking. The fishermen also wish to join the fray. So we plan on having them protect the rear.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Simon', 3: 'Atiel, you and I will protect the rear along with the fishermen.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Atiel', 3: "Wait, why won't you let me join the frontline, Simon? I'm just a little banged up is all...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Simon', 3: "It's not because of that. You're just needed in the rear... I am taking your injuries into consideration, so after the battle you can return to the base to get fixed up. Afterward, you can rejoin the front line.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "We'll be responsible for luring the enemy. Simon and the others will support from the rear, correct? 【kuroname】 will be in charge of the Forest Guard.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you certain about this?', 3: '49', 4: 'Leave it to me.', 5: '50'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Yep, we can't connect with you without any modifications, but we'll be sure to carry out your orders.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Glad I can trust you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So we launch a joint attack like last time, Diana?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Yup, we're running together again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "No, I can't run anymore...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "No worries, I've got backup.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Backup?!', 4: '2'}
